title: Conditional Rendering
story: Components can show different content based on conditions. Let's display a message only when a condition is true!
instructions: Create a WelcomeMessage component that accepts an 'isLoggedIn' prop. If isLoggedIn is true, display 'Welcome back!' in a div. If false, display 'Please log in.' in a div.

componentTests.description: When isLoggedIn is false, shows 'Please log in.'

hints.text: Use the ternary operator: condition ? valueIfTrue : valueIfFalse
